title: Respond to Medical Information Request
description: A medical information specialist must respond to an unsolicited email inquiry from a Healthcare Professional (HCP) about the off-label use of a drug.

tasks.description: Log the incoming request and verify the HCP's credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new case in the medical information system and verifies the HCP's license.

tasks.description: Search the internal medical knowledge base for standard response documents related to the inquiry.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a relevant standard response letter and a list of published literature.

tasks.description: Draft a non-promotional, scientifically balanced response letter using the approved documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent composes a response that is accurate and compliant with regulations.

tasks.description: Send the response to the HCP and close the case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the email and updates the case status to 'Closed'.
